d1_flags: 1. goto C66DF2 if TALKED_TO_MOM is set
1. goto C66E13 if LEFT_HOME_AT_LEAST_ONCE is set
d1_text:
Npc0015:
[GOTO_IF_FLAG LEFT_HOME_AT_LEAST_ONCE L_C66E13]
[GOTO_IF_FLAG TALKED_TO_MOM L_C66DF2]
ï¿½What was that noise?[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½[PRINT_NAME NESS],[PAUSE 15] you don't seem scared.[PAUSE 20]  Are you nuts?[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½And now you want to go check it out?[PAUSE 15]  ...oh[PAUSE 15] ...okay.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½You'll sneak out of your room anyway,[PAUSE 15] even if I asked you not to.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½At least change out of your jammies before you go.[WAIT][CLOSE_ALL_TBOXES]
[PAUSE 1][SET_FLAG TALKED_TO_MOM]
[CLR_FLAG NESS_WEARING_PAJAMAS]
[PRESET_TELEPORT 196]
[END]
